title: Small Cursor in game from Windows 10 Possibly??? HELP!!!!

embed.description: The ASUS Q-Series Q534 is a Windows ® 10 2-in-1 PC with a special hinge that enables the screen to be set at just about any angle. With a 15.6" 4K UHD Touchscreen, powerful Intel Core™ i7 processor and display that can be flipped at any angle from 0 to 360 degrees, the Q534 can be used as a powerful laptop, a responsive tablet or anything in between.

body:
I am having a problem where I get in game (after buying a new laptop "Asus") Where my mouse cursor is so small that I can barely see it in game. I have tried uninstalling and reinstalling LOL. I have changed my resolution to every possible option and nothing fixes it, and ive tried changing my actual mouse cursor size on my desktop and nothing helps. Im not very computer savy so please help me!!! Ive been reading and some people are saying the windows 10 and LOL dont get along but maybe there is another way. Any help would be great. Thanks!

Here are my computer specs:

Windows 10 Home

Intel® Core™ i7-7500U Processor for multitasking efficiency
Backlit keyboard and ice cool palm rest for a comfortable typing experience
4K UHD touch display and a powerful NVIDIA GeForce GTX950M graphics card for stunning visuals

replies.body:
Hey there,

Have you tried changing your desktop resolution also? (Not just your ingame resolution)
